name: optimus-stocks
description: OptimusStock is a comprehensive stock portfolio management application designed to assist users in managing and optimizing their stock investments. The application provides a wide range of features including portfolio tracking, insights and analytics, educational content, and a chatbot for personalized assistance. Users can view and manage their stock portfolios, analyze individual stocks, receive personalized recommendations, and stay informed with market news and sentiment data.
author: Charbel Dabire
